Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Tomas Sarachaga
Dear Sir,
Tomas Sarachaga isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .193, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1991
Subject: Progress of Colby Zamora
Dear Sir,
Colby Zamora has nothing more to prove at AA !
He has an ERA of 0.36 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
